MAN.TITLE: etl_scicos_el1xxx

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: Master-ID of the Master Interface. Has to be zero or an positive integer.
Working Domain ID for the working slave. Default zero or an positive integer.
Alternative slave addressing possibill√≠ty, see Slave Position. Zero or an positive 16 Bit integer.
Slave position in the ethercat bus. Zero or an positive integer

DESCRIPTION.P: This Block represents an EL1xxx Beckhoff EtherCAT Slave. You can access Fieldbus IO during Simulation and after Codegeneration in standalone running mode
